title: Geometric sans on "The Lick - Best Of" CD cover
content:
Hi everyone,  
can anybody tell me what type is used in ’best of’?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907051306im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/thelick_5129.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Very bold serif faces - Didoni (Pistilli Roman), Caslon {Andrew J Sipe, Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907051306/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46742 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Recipes" 50s style connected script - Park Avenue {Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907051306/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46623 "Go to next forum topic")
author: toby1

comments.content: Everything apart from the ’s’ screams ITC Avant Garde Gothic.
you think the ’s’ has been modified then?
Possibly, but I’m not sure. I must say that it doesn’t look 100% right.
